Title: STDDEV_SAMP
Description: Returns the sample standard deviation of expr (the square root of VAR_SAMP()).
It is an aggregate function, and so can be used with the GROUP BY clause.
STDDEV_SAMP() can be used as a window function.
STDDEV_SAMP() returns NULL if there were no matching rows.
Examples: SELECT STDDEV_SAMP(value) FROM (SELECT 1 AS value UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3) AS temp;
